website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a swing that's reminiscent of tire swings of the past, this is the one to get.
pros: A classic tire swing with rugged hardware
Build is durable, and tire offers ample space for kids to enjoy
Not too difficult for those with some experience to install
cons: Swivel mechanism doesn't move smoothly unless you keep it oiled
Requires a thick, sturdy tree branch

customer_reviews.title: Eastern Jungle Gym Horrible customers service
customer_reviews.text: It's probably a fine product if you get it all. That wasn't my case. Eastern Jungle Gym took no responsibility for the chain and eye hooks not being in the shipment. Between this coming without all the parts and the swing set bracket (also Eastern Jungle Gym) I purchased not fitting the recommended lumber, I will definitely not be buying this brand again. Edit: after some additional emailing I was able to get the missing pieces. It is a nice tire swing (when in it's entirety).
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well built, and easy to assemble. Came with everything I needed. I would recommend this if you want a real tire swing
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: There were missing pieces with this. It should have come with 3 chained but they were not included.
customer_reviews.author: keller

customer_reviews.title: Instant fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Well built and easy to assemble, though you'll need about 5" thick of wood to drill through since the bolts are so long. My 4 & 1/2 y/o daughter gives it 20 out of 5 stars. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: B. Ruwe

customer_reviews.title: Great tire swing that will last forever!
customer_reviews.text: Great tire swing but the pre drilled holes on the tire was 4 holes not 3 shown in pic but it was a easy fix after drilling out two more holes to space out the chain correctly so the swing would balance as it should. Kids are happy I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect assembly
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. However, there were four holes drilled into the tire. In the picture there are 3 holes. So, we had to redo the hole position. An inconvenient task when it should’ve been done correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Paul baumert

customer_reviews.title: Good tire, but I’m missing a chain.
customer_reviews.text: I am missing a chain to my tire swing and can’t find a number of who to contact.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and came axactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and came axactly as described. Would've given it 5 stars but tire was very oily and stained kids clothes. Definitely recommend though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris V

customer_reviews.title: Holds at least a 120 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for teenage son. Very sturdy. I was concerned about the weight it would hold, but have had no problems. Everyone enjoys the tire swing. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Eric E OMeara

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves it
customer_reviews.text: Installed this from a 6x6 treated post installed between two trees. Was a little concerned about the strength of the hardware considering my 6 year-old grandson likes to swing high, but so far so good. The tire is just the right size and the plastic-coated chain is a nice plus. Was concerned that the spring clips wouldn't take to load, but no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

product_meta.title: Eastern Jungle Gym Heavy-Duty 3-Chain Rubber Tire Swing Seat with Adjustable Coated Swing Chains, Tire Swivel, Snap Hooks, Mounting Hardware - Swing Set Accessories
product_meta.description: Add an exciting new activity to your backyard wooden swing set with the Eastern Jungle Gym 3-Chain Rubber Tire Swing! Complete with Tire Swivel, Mounting Hardware and Snap Hooks, this bundle comes with everything you need to install a tire swing set onto your wooden playset. A low maintenance outdoor kids swing, this large 3-chain tire swing comes complete with three coated swing chains that are stronger than rope, designed for soft-gripping and pinch-free. The chain is adjustable up to 30" and is 66" long. The bottom 30" of swing chain is coated in yellow plastisol and the rubber tire is black. This large tire swing allows enough room for three children and requires minimal assembly. The tire swing seat is pre-drilled for easy installation! There are three small holes on the top side for the swing chains and four larger holes on the bottom side for the drainage of water. Even better, this kit comes complete with a heavy-duty tire swivel, mounting hardware and 3 snap hooks. Everything you need to install your tire swing! The mounting hardware included with the tire swivel (2 - 6-1/2" x 3/8" hex head through bolts, 4 - 3/8" washers and 2 locking nuts) can fit a swing beam up to 4" x 6" in size. The heavy-duty tire swivel is galvanized and comes pre-greased, so you can use it right away!
feature_bullets: Includes everything you need to install a tire swing on a wooden swing set! Comes complete with 1 - 3-Chain Rubber Tire swing, 1 – Tire Swivel, Tire Swivel Mounting Hardware and 3 Snap Hooks.
Tire swing fits up to three children; tire diameter is approximately 27”; Swing chains are 66” long, the bottom 30” of chain are coated in yellow plastisol for a soft, pinch-free grip.

PLEASE READ INSTRUCTIONS: Tire Swing is pre-drilled with 3 evenly spaced small holes on the top side for the placement of swing chains and 4 larger holes on the bottom side to allow for the drainage of water. DO NOT attempt to connect the chains to the side with four holes; flip the tire over to locate the 3 smaller, holes for the connection of the swing chains.
Tire swing requires minor assembly and attaches to most swing beams up to 9’ high. Included tire swivel mounting hardware attaches to swing beams up to 4” x 6”.
Heavy duty tire swivel is galvanized and allows for 360 degree spinning and hours of fun!
